title: Climate Change Leadership Development Through Choice-Based Personalized Education (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational climate change concepts and social science analytical skills
context.additional_context: A corporate social responsibility education program for working professionals. Learners select and analyze local cases connected to their work environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least one local climate change issue relevant to their work
Using individually selected materials, learners can derive at least three community-tailored climate action plans
Learners evaluate the applicability of choice-based learning experiences to problem-solving in the workplace with over 80% positivity
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
